title: Oshaberi na Jikanwari
sinopse:
Oshaberi na Jikanwari is a story that is based on Mizusawa Megumi sensei's own love story. It is the story of how she had a crush on a boy since primary school and it tells of her struggles and the events that took place while she goes through primary school to junior high to senior high.

(Source: Esthétique)
